identity.mission: Create a top 1% minimalist SaaS dashboard that balances functional density with breathing room.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Soft Utility warmth.
Emotion First: Calm, organized, and efficient.
Content is King: Data clarity is the hero.
Zoom in: Focus on the task at hand.
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load.

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Modal titles

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny (text-xs) + Wide Spacing (tracking-widest).
Line height: Tight (leading-none) for headers, Relaxed (leading-relaxed) for body.

primary.name: Deep Slate
primary.usage: Primary buttons, Active states, Sidebar bg (optional)

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 or Slate-950.
Backgrounds should be off-white (Slate-50) to make white cards pop.
Gradients: Use only for 'Active' borders or subtle backgrounds, never for main text.
Every pixel utilized, no jagged bottoms.

containers.glass_effect: Use only for sticky headers or overlays (backdrop-blur-xl, bg-white/80).

inputs.style: Minimalist, bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-100 focus:border-indigo-500 rounded-md h-10

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, w-64, border-r border-slate-200, bg-white
navigation.item: flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900 transition-colors

textures: Subtle noise overlay on dashboard background (optional) to reduce digital flatness.

rules: Images must be high quality and professional.
Use object-cover for all image containers.
Add subtle overlay (bg-black/10) on text-heavy image backgrounds.
Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2).
Interactive elements must have aria-labels if icon-only.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Manrope and Public Sans via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
2. Update tailwind.config.js to include these fonts and the custom color palette.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar and Main Content area.
4. Use the 'Bento Grid' approach for the Dashboard Home.
5. Implement the 7 modules as distinct sections/routes.
6. Use Shadcn UI components but override the default styling to match the 'Soft Utility' theme (rounder, softer shadows).
7. Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid AI slop: No generic gradients, no centered text everywhere.
Create depth: Use z-index and subtle shadows.
No text-align: center on the main app container.
